text:
@realDonaldTrump @narendramodi But it is okay that America doesn’t have all the ventilators we need?
WHY does Trump HATE AMERICA so much?
Let’s face it people
It is more than obvious Trump WANTS the Coronavirus to KILL Americans.
Otherwise he would do more to help America with the fight against Coronavirus
